text: Peter Brooke Cadogan Fenwick (25 May 1935 - 22 November 2024) was a British neuropsychiatrist and neurophysiologist. He was known for his studies of epilepsy and end-of-life phenomena. Fenwick was a senior lecturer at King's College, London. He worked as a consultant at the Institute of Psychiatry. Fenwick died on 22 November 2024 at his home in London at the age of 89. ==Works== * The Art of Dying (Continuum, 2008) * Past Lives: An Investigation into Reincarnation Memories (Berkley, 2001) * The Hidden Door: Understanding and Controlling Dreams (Berkley Publishing Group, 1999) * The Truth in the Light: An Investigation of Over 300 Near-Death Experiences (Berkley Trade, 1997) * Living with Epilepsy (Bloomsbury, 1996) ==References== ==Other websites== *The Truth in Light Book Review by Anthony Campbell *Peter Fenwick's YouTube Channel Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:British writers Category:British neuroscientists Category:British psychiatrists Category:British physiologists
